column1: Smoque BBQ////If you dig vinegar-based BBQ sauce (which I do)
column2: then this is the place for you.  Brisket sandwich (widely and positively reviewed) deserves the recognition.  To me
column5: especially the spare ribs.  They have two sauces
column7: but even that has a pretty strong hit of vinegar.  I love both sauces.  My only wish is a spicy sauce option
column8: which they don't have.  As an added bonus
column9: they have the best sides of any BBQ joint we've been to.  The coleslaw has no mayo
column10: the mac and cheese is delicious and plenty crusty on top
column11: and the fries are fresh-cut and seasoned well.  Everything is super well executed.  We will be back for sure!
